channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: @lessig I don't get it -- I want Putin gone. I don't see any way out of this mess with him still there. I kind of like that Biden said that.
Any sane person agrees with the president, btw, just sayin, that might enter into your calculations. https://t.co/1dElNRbClF

‚ÄúI‚Äôm fine with opinion: conservative opinion, liberal opinion, but when people start to question the truth ‚Äî Who won the 2020 election? Was Jan. 6 an insurrection? ‚Äî I found that unsustainable.‚Äù https://t.co/pyU41qKAZ7
Computer desk porn. https://t.co/SXF4PvpnTI
@Super_Grover Yeah I meant something else if you think about it a little you‚Äôll figure it out.
How to Talk to People About a Pandemic. https://t.co/Id9gcv0pHj

You can tell I have hard mode turned off by the row of grey below. I was trying to eliminate a bunch of consonants, and as you can see it worked. I don't think there was a way to solve this one in "hard mode." https://t.co/Gj9w2db8aB
@BeaReno The only way it works is if the mayor doesn‚Äôt give a shit about what people think which is what Bloomberg‚Äôs secret was.
@BeaReno It‚Äôs a shitty job.
Just learned about ‚Äúhard mode‚Äù in Wordle. I have had it turned off. I think it‚Äôs bogus.
New York‚Äôs mayor faces a backlash over a vaccine exemption for athletes. (People don‚Äôt seem to get the pandemic is not over.) https://t.co/JUNKr9jfBl
Twitter is becoming Yahoo.

@alexwilliams @bketelsen I liked Heroku, and added the app-running functionality to my web server, https://t.co/7tk2vhVTaD. I didn't promote it because I just wanted to use the functionality, not support it.
Wordle 280 5/6 üü®üü®‚¨ú‚¨ú‚¨ú üü®üü®‚¨ú‚¨ú‚¨ú ‚¨ú‚¨ú‚¨ú‚¨ú‚¨ú üü©üü©üü©‚¨ú‚¨ú üü©üü©üü©üü©üü©
Russian general Yakov Rezantsev killed in Ukraine. https://t.co/vDRC40qQmv
Programmable Notes. https://t.co/RWHuyoOfDs
I imagine Putin watching this and blowing his top. https://t.co/etmNa8Vjoh

Idea for @chrislhayes -- compare the way the repubs in congress work, and the way putin's politics work in russia. help americans see we have a common bond with russians, we both want to remove the insanity from governance. save the planet from nuclear and climate catastrophe.
btw, climate will be a more rational, powerful and unrelenting adversary than putin. we know at some point putin will die. the climate will only learn new tricks to make us miserable. the evacuation of ukraine is a very small rehearsal our future.

Big change in Twitter, I've not seen any comment on it. The downvote icon on a reply to a tweet of yours. I'll have to go look for an explanation, but of course it must feed their (new) algorithm. https://t.co/aA2a1lOjoS

@KenSmith I absolutely do that. I think of it as taking a problem for a bike ride or a walk, or sleeping on it. But I didn't write this up well because I was describing something else. Having a short list of little projects that I don't have to think about -- I can just do them. Warmups.

@KenSmith I absolutely do that. I think of it as taking a problem for a bike ride or a walk, or sleeping on it. But I didn't write this up well because I was describing something else. Maybe this is something I should do a quick podcast for.
The medical establishment gaslights doctors, insisting long Covid is "psychological." https://t.co/46bSfQvVYk
One thing that seems evident after the Putin attack on Ukraine. The only people outside the US who want the Repubs to win are the other despots whose people would kill them if they could.
How Republican dirty tricks paved the way for Russian meddling in 2016. https://t.co/D8NqaPcLqq
